From Wiktionary, the free dictionary

Aragonese

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From Latin repraesentō.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /repɾesenˈta(ɾ)/
  • Syllabification: re‧pre‧sen‧tar
  • Rhymes: -a(ɾ)

Verb

[edit]

representar

  1. (transitive) to represent

Conjugation

[edit]

This entry needs an inflection-table template.

References

[edit]
  • Bal Palazios, Santiago (2002), “representar”, in Dizionario breu de a luenga aragonesa, Zaragoza, →ISBN

Catalan

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin repraesentāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): (Central, Balearic) [rə.pɾə.zənˈta]
  • IPA(key): (Valencia) [re.pɾe.zenˈtaɾ]
  • Audio (Barcelona):(file)

Verb

[edit]

representar (first-person singular present represento, first-person singular preterite representí, past participle representat); root stress: (Central, Valencia, Balearic) /e/

  1. to represent

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of representar (first conjugation)
infinitive representar
gerund representant
past participle masculine feminine
singular representat representada
plural representats representades
person singular plural
first second third first second third
indicative jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present represento representes representa representem representeu representen
imperfect representava representaves representava representàvem representàveu representaven
future representaré representaràs representarà representarem representareu representaran
preterite representí representares representà representàrem representàreu representaren
conditional representaria representaries representaria representaríem representaríeu representarien
subjunctive jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present representi representis representi representem representeu representin
imperfect representés representessis representés representéssim representéssiu representessin
imperative — tu vostè nosaltres vosaltres
vós 		vostès
affirmative — representa representi representem representeu representin
negative (no) — no representis no representi no representem no representeu no representin

Derived terms

[edit]
  • representable
  • representant
  • sobrerepresentar

Related terms

[edit]
  • representació
  • representatiu
  • representador

Further reading

[edit]
  • “representar”, in Diccionari de la llengua catalana [Dictionary of the Catalan Language] (in Catalan), second edition, Institute of Catalan Studies [Catalan: Institut d'Estudis Catalans], April 2007
  • “representar”, in Gran Diccionari de la Llengua Catalana, Grup Enciclopèdia Catalana, 2025
  • “representar” in Diccionari normatiu valencià, Acadèmia Valenciana de la Llengua.
  • “representar” in Diccionari català-valencià-balear, Antoni Maria Alcover and Francesc de Borja Moll, 1962.

Galician

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From Latin repraesentō.

Verb

[edit]

representar (first-person singular present represento, first-person singular preterite representei, past participle representado)

  1. to represent (to symbolize; to depict)

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of representar
Singular Plural
First-person
(eu) 		Second-person
(ti) 		Third-person
(el / ela / Vde.) 		First-person
(nós) 		Second-person
(vós) 		Third-person
(eles / elas / Vdes.)
Infinitive
Impersonal representar
Personal representar representares representar representarmos representardes representaren
Gerund
representando
Past participle
Masculine representado representados
Feminine representada representadas
Indicative
Present represento representas representa representamos representades representan
Imperfect representaba representabas representaba representabamos representabades representaban
Preterite representei representaches representou representamos representastes representaron
Pluperfect representara representaras representara representaramos representarades representaran
Future representarei representarás representará representaremos representaredes representarán
Conditional representaría representarías representaría representariamos representariades representarían
Subjunctive
Present represente representes represente representemos representedes representen
Imperfect representase representases representase representásemos representásedes representasen
Future representar representares representar representarmos representardes representaren
Imperative
Affirmative representa represente representemos representade representen
Negative (non) non representes non represente non representemos non representedes non representen
    Reintegrated conjugation of representar (See Appendix:Reintegrationism)

(ti / tu) 		Third-person
(ele / ela / você) 		First-person
(nós) 		Second-person
(vós) 		Third-person
(eles / elas / vocês)

Impersonal representar
Personal representar representares representar representarmos representardes representarem
Gerund
representando
Past participle
Masculine representado representados
Feminine representada representadas
Indicative
Present represento representas representa representamos representades, representais representam
Imperfect representava representavas representava representávamos representávades, representáveis, representávais1 representavam
Preterite representei representaste, representache1 representou representamos representastes representárom, representaram
Pluperfect representara representaras representara representáramos representárades, representáreis, representárais1 representaram
Future representarei representarás representará representaremos representaredes, representareis representarám, representarão
Conditional representaria representarias representaria representaríamos representaríades, representaríeis, representaríais1 representariam
Subjunctive
Present represente representes represente representemos representedes, representeis representem
Imperfect representasse representasses representasse representássemos representássedes, representásseis representassem

Imperative
Affirmative representa represente representemos representade, representai representem
Negative (nom) nom representes nom represente nom representemos nom representedes, nom representeis nom representem

1Less recommended.

Derived terms

[edit]
  • sobrerrepresentar

Related terms

[edit]
  • representación
  • representador
  • representante
  • representativo
  • representable

Further reading

[edit]
  • “representar”, in Dicionario da Real Academia Galega (in Galician), A Coruña: Royal Galician Academy, 2012–2025
  • “representar”, in Dicionário Estraviz de galego (in Galician), 2014–2025

Occitan

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From Latin repraesentō. Attested from the 14th century.[1]

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • Audio (Béarn):(file)

Verb

[edit]

representar

  1. to represent

Conjugation

[edit]
    Lengadocian (Central Occitan)
simple compound
infinitive representar aver representat
gerund representant use gerund of aver + past participle
past participle representat —
person singular plural
first second third first second third
indicative ieu tu el nosautres vosautres eles
present representi representas representa representam representatz representan
imperfect representavi representavas representava representàvem representàvetz representavan
preterite representèri representères representèt representèrem representèretz representèron
future representarai representaràs representarà representarem representaretz representaràn
conditional representariái representariás representariá representariam representariatz representarián
conditional 2nd form1 representèra representèras representèra representeram representeratz representèran
compound
tenses 		present perfect use the present tense of aver + past participle
pluperfect use the imperfect tense of aver + past participle
past anterior use the preterite tense of aver + past participle
future perfect use the future tense of aver + past participle
conditional perfect use the conditional tense of aver + past participle
subjunctive que ieu que tu que el que nosautres que vosautres que eles
present represente representes represente representem representetz representen
imperfect representèssi representèsses representèsse representèssem representèssetz representèsson
compound
tenses 		past use the present subjunctive of aver + past participle
pluperfect use the imperfect subjunctive of aver + past participle
imperative — tu — nosautres vosautres —
representa representem representatz 1Now chiefly obsolete, still in use in some Limousin and Vivaro-Alpin dialects

Portuguese

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin repraesentāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
 
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /ʁe.pɾe.zẽˈta(ʁ)/ [he.pɾe.zẽˈta(h)]
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /ʁe.pɾe.zẽˈta(ʁ)/ [he.pɾe.zẽˈta(h)]
    • (São Paulo) IPA(key): /ʁe.pɾe.zẽˈta(ɾ)/ [he.pɾe.zẽˈta(ɾ)]
    • (Rio de Janeiro) IPA(key): /ʁe.pɾe.zẽˈta(ʁ)/ [χe.pɾe.zẽˈta(χ)]
    • (Southern Brazil) IPA(key): /ʁe.pɾe.zẽˈta(ɻ)/ [he.pɾe.zẽˈta(ɻ)]
 
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /ʁɨ.pɾɨ.zẽˈtaɾ/
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /ʁɨ.pɾɨ.zẽˈtaɾ/
    • (Southern Portugal) IPA(key): /ʁɨ.pɾɨ.zẽˈta.ɾi/

  • Hyphenation: re‧pre‧sen‧tar

Verb

[edit]

representar (first-person singular present represento, first-person singular preterite representei, past participle representado)

  1. to represent
  2. to typify
  3. to depict

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of representar (See Appendix:Portuguese verbs)
Singular Plural
First-person
(eu) 		Second-person
(tu) 		Third-person
(ele / ela / você) 		First-person
(nós) 		Second-person
(vós) 		Third-person
(eles / elas / vocês)
Infinitive
Impersonal representar
Personal representar representares representar representarmos representardes representarem
Gerund
representando
Past participle
Masculine representado representados
Feminine representada representadas
Indicative
Present represento representas representa representamos representais representam
Imperfect representava representavas representava representávamos representáveis representavam
Preterite representei representaste representou representamos1, representámos2 representastes representaram
Pluperfect representara representaras representara representáramos representáreis representaram
Future representarei representarás representará representaremos representareis representarão
Conditional representaria representarias representaria representaríamos representaríeis representariam
Subjunctive
Present represente representes represente representemos representeis representem
Imperfect representasse representasses representasse representássemos representásseis representassem
Future representar representares representar representarmos representardes representarem
Imperative
Affirmative representa represente representemos representai representem
Negative (não) não representes não represente não representemos não representeis não representem

1Brazilian Portuguese.
2European Portuguese.

Quotations

[edit]

For quotations using this term, see Citations:representar.

Derived terms

[edit]
  • representante
  • representável
  • sobrerrepresentar

Related terms

[edit]
  • representação
  • representador
  • representativo

Descendants

[edit]
  • Hunsrik: rëpresenteere

Further reading

[edit]
  • “representar”, in Dicionário Priberam da Língua Portuguesa (in Portuguese), Lisbon: Priberam, 2008–2025

Spanish

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From Latin repraesentāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /repɾesenˈtaɾ/ [re.pɾe.sẽn̪ˈt̪aɾ]
  • Rhymes: -aɾ
  • Syllabification: re‧pre‧sen‧tar

Verb

[edit]

representar (first-person singular present represento, first-person singular preterite representé, past participle representado)

  1. to represent
  2. to make up, constitute, account for

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of representar (See Appendix:Spanish verbs)
infinitive representar
gerund representando
past participle masculine feminine
singular representado representada
plural representados representadas
singular plural
1st person 2nd person 3rd person 1st person 2nd person 3rd person
indicative yo tú
vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ellos/ellas
ustedes
present represento representastú
representásvos 		representa representamos representáis representan
imperfect representaba representabas representaba representábamos representabais representaban
preterite representé representaste representó representamos representasteis representaron
future representaré representarás representará representaremos representaréis representarán
conditional representaría representarías representaría representaríamos representaríais representarían
subjunctive yo tú
vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ellos/ellas
ustedes
present represente representestú
representésvos2 		represente representemos representéis representen
imperfect
(ra) 		representara representaras representara representáramos representarais representaran
imperfect
(se) 		representase representases representase representásemos representaseis representasen
future1 representare representares representare representáremos representareis representaren
imperative — tú
vos 		usted nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ustedes
affirmative representatú
representávos 		represente representemos representad representen
negative no representes no represente no representemos no representéis no representen

1Mostly obsolete, now mainly used in legal language.
2Argentine and Uruguayan voseo prefers the tú form for the present subjunctive.
